timelineEvents.title: Our First Date
timelineEvents.subtitle: September 21, 2013
timelineEvents.description: It all started with a cup of coffee. We talked for hours and it felt like minutes. I knew something special was beginning.

timelineEvents.title: The Proposal
timelineEvents.subtitle: June 5, 2015
timelineEvents.description: Under a sky painted with sunset colors, I asked, and you said yes. The happiest moment of my life, until our wedding day.

timelineEvents.title: Our Wedding Day
timelineEvents.subtitle: October 10, 2016
timelineEvents.description: Surrounded by family and friends, we promised forever. A day filled with love, laughter, and dancing.

timelineEvents.title: Honeymoon in Paradise
timelineEvents.subtitle: October 12, 2016
timelineEvents.description: Our first adventure as a married couple. Sandy toes, salty kisses, and unforgettable memories.

timelineEvents.title: Moved Into Our First Home
timelineEvents.subtitle: May 1, 2018
timelineEvents.description: The start of a new chapter. We turned a house into our home, one memory at a time.
